title: Ken Jeong: Doctor By Day, Comedian By Night
teaser: Before Ken Jeong played Se√±or Chang in Community and the infamous Mr. Chow in The Hangover, his patients knew him as Dr. Jeong. This piece originally aired on All Things Considered on April 5, 2014.
